overview: Lisetta Carmi is one of the most important photographers in Italian and international history. Her shots, her vision of the world, her passionate works that went against the grain of society in the 1960s and 1970s have marked the art world to this day. Lisetta Carmi, "a soul on the road" constantly searching for the truth of the people and the world around her.
title: Lisetta Carmi, un'anima in cammino
